Package ohos.data.orm

Class BindUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.orm.BindUtils

  • public class BindUtils
extends Object
    A utility class that provides methods to convert data formats.

    This class provides methods to convert data of the java.sql.Blob type into a byte array and convert data of the java.sql.Clob type into a string.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_APPDATAMGR

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • bindBlob

        public static byte[] bindBlob​(Blob blob)
        Converts data of the java.sql.Blob type into a byte array.

        java.sql.Blob stores binary large objects. This method converts the binary large objects into a byte array.

        Parameters:
        blob - Indicates the binary large objects.
        Returns:
        Returns the obtained byte array.
        Since:
        1

      • clobToString

        public static String clobToString​(Clob clob)
        Converts data of the java.sql.Clob type into a string.

        java.sql.Clob stores character large objects. This method converts the character large objects into a string.

        Parameters:
        clob - Indicates the character large objects.
        Returns:
        Returns the obtained string.
        Since:
        1

      • getCalendar

        public static Calendar getCalendar​(long time)
        Translates time in long format into time in calendar format.
        Parameters:
        time - Indicates the time in long format (accurate to milliseconds).
        Returns:
        Returns the time in calendar format.
